                                                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> requiredFields,
                                                  java.lang.String originalString)
        Does the common validation for the specified field in the method
        Parameters:
        token - Validation token
        requiredFields - A list of all required fields to check through
        originalString - String object passed in to checked
        Returns:
        JSON Object of errors if there are errors, if not returns null;
